reference_a:
@article{marian2023,
  title = {The dynamic interplay of anxious and depressive symptoms in a sample of undergraduate students},
  author = {Marian, Stefan and Costantini, Giulio and Macsinga, Irina and Sava, Florin Alin},
  date = {2023-03-01},
  journaltitle = {Journal of Psychopathology and Behavioral Assessment},
  shortjournal = {J Psychopathol Behav Assess},
  volume = {45},
  number = {1},
  pages = {150--159},
  issn = {1573-3505},
  doi = {10.1007/s10862-022-10014-8}
}
sampling_scheme: 4x/day 4 hour intervals based on individual wake-up time
additional_comments: some participants pre-excluded due to compliance by authors, some collected symptoms strongly overlap and were combined in the original article, exact translation of some GAD/PHQ questions to EMA wording unclear - for example, about frequency of sleep issues

features.name: status
features.coding: 1 = complete row, 2 = incomplete row, 99 = empty row (participants skipped/missed the beep)

features.name: completion_time
features.coding: Completion time for prompt in seconds

features.name: worry
features.coding:
Experienced excessive worry
GAD Item 1
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: difficulty_control_worry
features.coding:
Found difficult to control worry once it started
GAD Item 2
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: restless
features.coding:
Felt restless, keyed up or on edge
GAD Item 3
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: fatiguability
features.coding:
Were easily fatigued
GAD Item 4
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: difficulty_concentrating
features.coding:
Had difficulties concentrating or mind going blank
GAD Item 5
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: irritable
features.coding:
Were irritable
GAD Item 6
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: muscle_tension
features.coding:
Felt muscle tension
GAD Item 7
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: sleep_difficulty
features.coding:
Last night, you had trouble falling asleep or didn't feel rested after sleep.
GAD Item 8
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: anhedonia
features.coding:
Little interest or pleasure in doing things
PHQ Item 1
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: depressed_mood
features.coding:
Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless
PHQ Item 2
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: sleep_problems
features.coding:
Trouble falling or staying asleep or sleeping too much.
PHQ Item 3
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: tired
features.coding:
Feeling tired or having little energy.
PHQ Item 4
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: appetite_change
features.coding:
Poor appetite or overeating
PHQ Item 5
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: worthlessness
features.coding:
Negative feelings about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
PHQ Item 6
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: concentration_trouble
features.coding:
Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
PHQ Item 7
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: psychomotor_change
features.coding:
Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed. Or the opposite being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
PHQ Item 8
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: suicidal_ideation
features.coding:
Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself
PHQ Item 9
1 = Never
2 = Once
3 = Several times
4 = Many times

features.name: something_wrong
features.coding:
There's something wrong with me.
1 = Not at all
2 = A short time
3 = A long time
4 = Most of the time
